DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate use oxytocin , give nasal spray , treatment high frequency episodic migraine chronic migraine .
DOC.brief_title: TI-001 ( Intranasal Oxytocin ) Treatment High Frequency Episodic Migraine Chronic Migraine
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , age 18 65 year primary diagnosis high frequency episodic migraine chronic migraine . 1 . Known allergy oxytocin 2 . History addictive behavior ( eg , alcoholism , drug abuse ) severe mood disorder 3 . History clinically significant , functionally impair cardiovascular pulmonary disease disease might confound study result 4 . Have basilar hemiplegic migraine 5 . Have substantial cognitive memory impairment due cause ( eg , Alzheimer 's dementia ) 6 . Have nasal obstruction due cause 7 . Are pregnant breast feed 8 . Require ongoing use steroidal nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug 9 . Are unable unwilling provide inform consent follow study procedure
